text: Melodinus fusiformis is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is native to China (Guangdong, Guangxi, Guizhou), Indochina, and the Island of Luzon in the Philippines.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China Vol. 16 Page 150 尖山橙 jian shan chen Melodinus fusiformis Champion ex Bentham, Hooker's J. Bot. Kew. Gard. Misc. 4: 332. 1852.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Melodinus yunnanensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
